message: I propose a slightly better split for me this time. This is still a fair deal for you before inflation erodes your gains further.
Still willing to share fairly, but need a bit more
Alice, let's be realistic.  I'm offering a good deal considering the inflation. This is the time to settle.
Inflation hurts, need a better split
Alice, this back and forth is pointless. I'm proposing a perfectly even split. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
